front.title: Ralltiir Freighter Captain
front.gametext: Power +2 at a Ralltiir site. Adds 2 to power and 1 to maneuver of anything he pilots. When piloting a starship and Ralltiir on table, may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. When making a Kessel Run from Ralltiir, doubles X.
front.lore: After Ralltiir's fall to the Empire, many former members of its defense force became smugglers and scouts. Hoping to liberate their planet.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)
Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere
